definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Please provide any playgroup or pre-school experience the applicant has.
sentences.chinese: 请提供有关幼儿曾修读任何亲子班或学前课程的资料。

sentences.english: View this list of parenting groups in San Mateo County and the Greater Bay Area.
sentences.chinese: 查看圣马刁县及湾区亲子团的资料。

sentences.english: Parents-children education is a newly sprung up education mode in the China.
sentences.chinese: 亲子教育是我国新兴的一种早的教育模式。

sentences.english: There is little doubt that maternal-child interaction plays a very important role in child development.
sentences.chinese: 亲子互动关系对子女成长的重要性，已不容置疑。

sentences.english: To celebrate the National Day, reinforce parent-child relationship and foster community harmony.
sentences.chinese: 庆祝国庆，加强亲子关系及促进社区和谐。

sentences.english: Justin's kindergarten had a parent-teacher-student activity on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 星期六大贝贝的幼稚园有亲子活动。

sentences.english: Ours is a generation that has witnessed the abrogation of the parent-child covenant.
sentences.chinese: 我这一代正是废除了亲子盟约必要性的见证。

sentences.english: Now they can get a paternity test over the counter.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们现在他们可以直接去专柜做亲子鉴定。

sentences.english: Cui teacher suggested that he go to the school and chu i parent-child dance competition.
sentences.chinese: 翠的老师建议玥与翠一起参加学校的亲子舞蹈比赛。

sentences.english: The tables and their relationship typically associated with a RDBMS like Parent-Child.
sentences.chinese: 表和他们的关系通常与像亲子关系数据库。

sentences.english: Ours is a generation that has witnessed the abrogation of the parent-child covenant.
sentences.chinese: 我这一代正是废除亲子盟约必要性的见证。

sentences.english: And the outcome, if you succeed, still will not be a normal parent-child relationship.
sentences.chinese: 如果你成功了，你们的亲子关系还是会与常人的不同。

sentences.english: See if we can prove paternity?
sentences.chinese: 看看能不能确定亲子关系？

sentences.english: Moreover, there were mutual impacts between mother-child relationship and child aggression.
sentences.chinese: 亲子关系与儿童攻击性之间也具有相互作用。

sentences.english: At the same time, paternity test report came out, yo is small.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，亲子鉴定报告出来了，余淼就是小顺。

sentences.english: Yin Tse is anxious for the result of his grandon's paternity test.
sentences.chinese: 谢贤很焦急的等待亲子鉴定的结果。

definition: early education (abbr. for 早期教育[zao3 qi1 jiao4 yu4])
to make learning fun/to combine education and entertainment
traditional handcrafted toy (e.g. spinning top 陀螺[tuo2 luo2], tangram 七巧板[qi1 qiao3 ban3] etc) (Tw)
qualities that delight children (e.g. bold colors in a picture, anthropomorphized characters in a TV show, the physical challenge of playground equipment)
to study away from home or abroad (old)
variant of 啟蒙|启蒙[qi3 meng2]/to instruct the young
to instruct the young/to initiate/to awake sb from ignorance/to free sb from prejudice or superstition/primer/enlightened/the Enlightenment/Western learning from the late Qing dynasty
